# Character Sheet

```{r} 
Ability <- c("STR", "DEX", "CON", "INT", "WIS", "CHA")
Stat <- c(10, 11, 8, 15, 13, 18)
Modifier <- c("+0", "+0", "-1", "+3", "+2", "+4")

charsheet <- data.frame(Ability, Stat, Modifier)

kable(charsheet)
```
